ingredients.ingredient: 6 ounces tomato basil feta cheese, crumbled
¼ cup Italian-style dry bread crumbs, divided

cookingTips: Top chicken with feta and bread crumbs after partial cooking to prevent burning
Use a meat thermometer to ensure chicken reaches 165°F internally
Tent with foil if bread crumb topping browns too quickly
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user prepare a simple but elegant baked chicken topped with creamy feta and crispy bread crumbs.
